full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Wet Drum Low Intensity Magnetic Separator

#### Reference Number
WS3675775284 - DOC3675876120

#### Solicitation Number
WS3675775284

#### Publication Date
October 20, 2022

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
December 13, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

#### Amendment Number
6

#### Amendment Date
December 5, 2022

#### Tender Status
Cancelled

#### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria

#### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
None

#### Regions of Delivery
Ottawa

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contracting Entity Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

#### End-User Entity
Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

#### End-User Entity Address
580 Booth St
Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4

#### Contact Information
Murray, David (SPAC/PSPC)
[david.murray@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.murray@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
581-996-5032

#### Tender Description
Natural Resources Canada requires one (1) Wet Drum Low Intensity Magnetic Separator, as detailed in the Pricing Annex and Specifications. The desired delivery date is March 31, 2023.

#### Unspsc Codes
* 20101600: Screens and feeding equipment
* 40161700: Separators
*41061000: Mineral, Metallic and Nonmetallic Minerals, Metallic Ores, Metals
#### Documents
More information is available on the Canadian Government Tender Portal (http://exelb2.ctools.org/tpsgc/mis/mis/prog/pproc/Workshop/tenders/index_en.html?[resolved=PSPC-(TS)]). The RFP document (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14409745) contains all relevant details.

We removed vast amounts of unnecessary text writing code, corrected formatting, adjusted grammar and contributed product descriptions from UNSPS categories with categories such as minerals, impacts manufacturing as a more precise categorization. Stay in touch
